Detailed Description

template<FieldName NAME_, typename TYPE_, uint8_t * BASE_, FieldFlags FLAGS_, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096, size_t SIZE = (std::is_pointer_v<TYPE_> ? K_ANY_SIZE : sizeof(TYPE_)), std::conditional_t< std::is_pointer_v< TYPE_ >, std::remove_pointer_t< TYPE_ >, TYPE_ > * CONST_VALUE_ = nullptr, MatcherType MATCHER = nullptr>
class proto::FieldPrototype< NAME_, TYPE_, BASE_, FLAGS_, MAX_SIZE, SIZE, CONST_VALUE_, MATCHER >

Template for protocol field definition and runtime handling.

Each field has:

  • Name (enum proto::FieldName);
  • Type (T), which can be a plain type or pointer;
  • Shared buffer base pointer (BASE);
  • Flags (FieldFlags);
  • Compile-time or dynamic size;
  • Optional constant value (for fixed fields).
Template Parameters
NAME_FieldName identifier.
TYPE_Field type (plain type or pointer).
BASE_Base pointer to the shared buffer.
FLAGS_FieldFlags mask.
MAX_SIZEHard cap for runtime size (safety limit for dynamic fields).
SIZECompile-time size. Use K_ANY_SIZE for dynamic-size fields.
CONST_VALUE_Optional pointer to a constant value copied on reset/apply.
MATCHEROptional matcher callback for validation/dispatch.

Definition at line 96 of file FieldPrototype.hpp.

◆ get_copy()

template<FieldName NAME_, typename TYPE_, uint8_t * BASE_, FieldFlags FLAGS_, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096, size_t SIZE = (std::is_pointer_v<TYPE_> ? K_ANY_SIZE : sizeof(TYPE_)), std::conditional_t< std::is_pointer_v< TYPE_ >, std::remove_pointer_t< TYPE_ >, TYPE_ > * CONST_VALUE_ = nullptr, MatcherType MATCHER = nullptr>
auto proto::FieldPrototype< NAME_, TYPE_, BASE_, FLAGS_, MAX_SIZE, SIZE, CONST_VALUE_, MATCHER >::get_copy ( ) const -> CopyType
inlinenodiscard

Return a value copy of the field content.

If T is a pointer type, returns a contiguous std::vector<ElemVal> sized from the current byte-length. If T is not a pointer, returns a plain value of type T (using memcpy for trivially copyable types).

Definition at line 182 of file FieldPrototype.hpp.

◆ print()

template<FieldName NAME_, typename TYPE_, uint8_t * BASE_, FieldFlags FLAGS_, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096, size_t SIZE = (std::is_pointer_v<TYPE_> ? K_ANY_SIZE : sizeof(TYPE_)), std::conditional_t< std::is_pointer_v< TYPE_ >, std::remove_pointer_t< TYPE_ >, TYPE_ > * CONST_VALUE_ = nullptr, MatcherType MATCHER = nullptr>
void proto::FieldPrototype< NAME_, TYPE_, BASE_, FLAGS_, MAX_SIZE, SIZE, CONST_VALUE_, MATCHER >::print ( )
inline

Print field contents in a table format.

Shows:

  • Field name
  • Value (hex)
  • Size
  • Offset
  • Inclusion in length / CRC as defined by FieldFlags::IS_IN_LEN and FieldFlags::IS_IN_CRC
  • Const value (if defined)

inlineprotectedvirtual

Set field value from raw bytes.

Copies GetSize() bytes into the field storage. When FieldFlags::REVERSE is set, bytes are written in reverse order.

◆ set_size()

template<FieldName NAME_, typename TYPE_, uint8_t * BASE_, FieldFlags FLAGS_, size_t MAX_SIZE = 4096, size_t SIZE = (std::is_pointer_v<TYPE_> ? K_ANY_SIZE : sizeof(TYPE_)), std::conditional_t< std::is_pointer_v< TYPE_ >, std::remove_pointer_t< TYPE_ >, TYPE_ > * CONST_VALUE_ = nullptr, MatcherType MATCHER = nullptr>
template<class DATA>
auto proto::FieldPrototype< NAME_, TYPE_, BASE_, FLAGS_, MAX_SIZE, SIZE, CONST_VALUE_, MATCHER >::set_size ( size_t size_to_set = K_ANY_SIZE) -> bool
inlineconstexprprotected

Configure runtime size for dynamic fields.

Effective only when SIZE == K_ANY_SIZE. The new size is taken from size_to_set when provided, otherwise deduced from sizeof(DATA) when DATA is not a pointer and not proto::EmptyDataType. The value is clamped by MAX_SIZE. For fields with CONST_VALUE the size cannot be changed.

Template Parameters
DATAElement type used for deduction when size is not provided.
Parameters
size_to_setByte length to set, or K_ANY_SIZE to auto-deduce.
Returns
true if size accepted (or unchanged), false if it exceeds MAX_SIZE.

Definition at line 301 of file FieldPrototype.hpp.
